records.description: Any person who wishes to import petroleum and flammable materials is required to obtain an import license from SCDF.
records.title: Petroleum & Flammable Material Import Licence

records.description: The Fire Safety Act (FSA) regulates the conveyance of Petroleum and Flammable Materials (P&FM) in pipelines. Anyone who intends to convey P&FM in pipeline running outside premises boundaries is required to obtain a licence from SCDF.
records.title: Petroleum & Flammable Material Pipeline Licence

records.description: Any person who wishes to transport petroleum and flammable materials is required to obtain an import license from SCDF.
records.title: Petroleum & Flammable Material Storage Licence

records.description: Any person who wishes to store petroleum and flammable materials is required to obtain an import license from SCDF.
records.title: Petroleum & Flammable Material Transport Licence
